Forum More from YDF Couponing - Grocery Deals - Rebates Other Store-specific Coupons ~Advance Auto Parts~Mail-In Rebates~Several Offers~
If this is your first visit, be sure to check out the FAQ by clicking the link above. You may have to register before you can post: click the register link above to proceed. To start viewing messages, select the forum that you want to visit from the selection below. + Reply to Thread Results 1 to 1 of 1 Thread: ~Advance Auto Parts~Mail-In Rebates~Several Offers~
Thread Tools
Show Printable Version Subscribe to this Thread…
09-07-2011, 09:20 AM #1 CherokeeParker View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Nov 2007 Posts 14,091 ~Advance Auto Parts~Mail-In Rebates~Several Offers~ Rebates Center Get even better deals on quality auto parts Find out about great rebate offers, download rebate forms, and moreall at the Advance Auto Parts Rebates Center.
http://shop.advanceautoparts.com/web...ent_rebates___
Plus: Get 20% Off Your Online Order ~ FREE Standard Shipping On Orders Over $75.00; Buy Online, Pick-Up In Store. No Minimum, Some Exclusions Apply Good For Online Orders Place Before 11/30/2011 Enter Code: P20 In Shopping Cart To Get Discount
http://shop.advanceautoparts.com/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet/content_Local-Search-P20-Detail?cm_mmc=ACQ-_-Brand-Terms-AAP--advance-_-advance+auto+parts-_-Broad Advance
Auto Parts Get $5 off Advance Auto Parts 50/50 Antifreeze (After mail-in rebate.) Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started.
Valid through September 28, 2011 Autolite Save $1 on Autolite Coil On Plug Boots (After mail-in rebate) Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started.
Valid through September 28, 2011
Get a free set of Autolite Double Platinum Spark Plugs With purchase of any set of Autolite Professional Series Spark Plug wires. (After mail-in rebate. Limit two free sets per customer.) Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started.
Valid through September 1, 2011
Get a $1.25 Rebate on each Autolite Single Platinum Spark Plugs, Up to $20 Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started.
Valid through November 30, 2011
Get a $1.50 rebate on each Autolite Double Platinum Spark Plugs, up to $24 Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started.
Valid through November 30, 2011
Get a $.50 rebate each on Autolite Copper Core Spark Plugs, up to $24 Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started.
Valid through November 30, 2011
Get up to $6 back on your purchase of one Autolite spark plug wire set Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started.
Valid through November 30, 2011
Get up to $2 back on Autolite automotive plugs Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started.
Valid through November 30, 2011
Get up to $2 back on Autolite small engine plugs Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started.
Valid through November 30, 2011
Bosch Save $1 each Bosch Platinum +4 or Platinum Plus Spark Plugs (After mail-in rebate) Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started. Valid through December 31, 2011
Save $2 each Bosch Iridium Spark Plugs (After mail-in rebate) Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started. Valid through December 31, 2011
Save $5 on any Bosch Distance Plus oil filter (After mail-in rebate. Limit $20 on four total filters.) Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started. Valid through October 29, 2011
Save $2 on any Bosch Premium oil filter (After mail-in rebate. Limit $8 on four total filters.) Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started. Valid through October 29, 2011
Save $0.50 each - Bosch Super Plus spark plugs (Limit 16 spark plugs per rebate) Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started. Valid through December 31, 2011
Castrol Free limited edition NFL Football With purchase of 5 or more quarts of Castrol EDGE Mail-in offer. Proof of purchase required.
Valid through December 31, 2011 Motor oil is available for in-store pickup only. Once you've made your qualifying purchase, click here to download the forms needed to process your free football. You may also get the football by paying $10, along with the purchase of five or more quarts of Castrol GTX High Mileage motor oil. Save $7 - on the purchase of five or more quarts of Castrol GTX, Castrol GTX High Mileage, Castrol GTX SynBlend, Castrol EDGE with Titanium or Castrol EDGE with SPT motor oil (After mail-in rebate) Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started. Valid through December 31, 2011
Champion Champion Iridium Plugs - only $3.99 each (After $2.50 mail-in rebate) Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started.
Valid through November 30, 2011 Champion Double Platinum Plugs - only $1.49 each (After $2.00 mail-in rebate) Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started.
Valid through November 30, 2011 Save up to $.50 each on Champion Copper Plus spark plugs (After mail-in rebate) Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started.
Valid through November 30, 2011 Dynomax Get $75 off a DynoMax cat-back exhaust system (After mail-in rebate) Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started.
Valid through August 31, 2011
Edelbrock Get $25 back on select Performer Series Carburetors by Edelbrock (After mail-in rebate) Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started.
Valid through September 30, 2011
Monroe Save up to $125 on Monroe Shocks or Struts. Purchase four qualifying Monroe or Rancho Premium shocks, struts or strut assemblies get $125 back. Purchase two qualifying Monroe Quick-Strut or Rancho quickLIFT assemblies get $50 back (After mail-in rebate.) Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started. Valid through October 31, 2011
MSD Get up to $40 back on MSD Ignition components. (After mail-in rebate.) Spend $250, get $25 back spend $400, get $40 back. Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started. Valid through August 31, 2011
Pennzoil Save $7 on the purchase of five quarts of Pennzoil Ultra, Pennzoil Platinum, Pennzoil High Mileage Vehicle or Pennzoil Conventional motor oil (After mail-in rebate. Rebate is also available on 5 Plus Quarts jugs.) Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started. Valid through December 31, 2011
Purolator Save $3 on any Purolator PureONE oil filter (After mail-in rebate. Limit $12 on four total filters.) Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started. Valid through October 29, 2011
Save $1.50 on any Purolator Classic oil filter. (After mail-in rebate. Limit $6 on four total filters.) Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started. Valid through October 29, 2011
Get $5 back when you purchase any Purolator Classic air filter (After mail-in rebate. Limit two filters) Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started. Valid through October 29, 2011
Get $7 back when you purchase any Purolator PureONE air filter (After mail-in rebate. Limit two filters) Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started. Valid through October 29, 2011
Prestone Save $15 on two regular-priced gallons of Prestone full strength antifreeze/coolant. Save $7 on one gallon. (After mail-in rebate) Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started. Valid through February 29, 2012
Save $11 on two regular-priced gallons of Prestone 50/50 antifreeze/coolant. Save $5 on one gallon. (After mail-in rebate) Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started. Valid through February 29, 2012
Quaker State Save $7 on the purchase of five or more quarts of any Quaker State motor oil. (After mail-in rebate) Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started. Valid through January 20, 2012
Valvoline Get up to $25 in mail-in rebates by registering with Valvoline's Engine Guarantee program! (Enter special code ADVN4119 for more rebate savings!) Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started. Valid through December 1, 2011
Save $7 on the purchase of five quarts of Valvoline Premium Conventional, NextGen Conventional, MaxLife High Mileage, NextGen High Mileage MaxLife, DuraBlend, SynPower, MaxLife Full Synthetic, or VR-1TM Racing Synthetic motor oil. (After mail-in rebate) Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started. Valid through December 31, 2011
Wagner Get a $30 rebate on Wagner ThermoQuiet brakes! After mail-in rebate when you purchase both front and back pads and shoes ($15 for each set) Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started. Valid through October 31, 2011
Walker Save $40 when you purchase a qualifying Walker Direct-Fit Catalytic Converter. (After mail-in rebate) Once you've made your purchase, click here to get the rebate process started. Valid through October 31, 2011 Reply With Quote
